articles.description: Spurs were due to host the Cottagers on Wednesday, having earned a 1-1 draw against Wolves at Molineux last Sunday. However, the game was abandoned owing to a Covid outbreak.
articles.content: Jose Mourinho has branded the late postponement of Tottenham's clash with Fulham 'unprofessional' and likened the Premier League's handling of the situation to his experience managing in kids' footba… [+3134 chars]

articles.title: Marcus Rashford says Manchester United must 'get over the line' this season and end trophy drought - Daily Mail
articles.description: United have fallen short of lifting their first trophy under Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, but expectations at Old Trafford are high once again after their fine start to domestic life this season.
articles.content:
Marcus Rashford has insisted Manchester United need to clinch silverware in 2021 following several near misses last season.
